Reviews.Title: A HOAX
Reviews.Author: Dione
Reviews.Content: A hoax. It arrived incomplete, without headphones and charging is not official Blackberry brand as is the case. A total theft. And to complete it do not works in Venezuela. The worst purchase of my life. Definitely the thieves are everywhere in the world. But God will multiply the damage that I've caused to you.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry z10
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I rate 5 stars because the seller gave good detail and the price was good.I rate Blackberry z10 a basic phone, Blackberry needs to update completely with their devices.I would like blackberry too, have more custom things on it that no other phone has. its just a basic phone to me, that when i switched from android to blackberry there was very limited things, i guess blackberry needs alot of app updates too. :)
